title: Thanga Magan Indru Lyrics Baasha
stanzas:
<div>
Thanga Magan Indru Lyrics Baasha

[Thanga magan indru
singa nadia potu
arugil arugil vanthaan

rendu puram pattri
urugum neruppaaga
mangai urugi nindraal] (2)

kattum aadai en kadhalan
kandathum naluviyathe
vetkathaalpaal adhu venthanai
kadathum vizhagiyathe.

raththa thaamarai
muththam kaetkuthu
vaa en vaazhve vaa.

Thanga magan indru
singa nadia potu
arugil arugil vanthaan

rendu puram pattri
urugum neruppaaga
mangai urugi nindraal

chinna kalaivaani nee
vanna silaimaeni
adhu manjam thanil
maaran thalai vaikkum
inbath thalagaani

aasai thalaivan nee
naan adimai magaraani
mangai ival angam engum
poosa neethaan maruthaani.

thirakkaatha pookkal
vediththaaga vendum.
thenpaandi thendral
thirandhaaga vendum.

enna sammathamaa
innum thaamathamaa

Thanga magan indru
singa nadia potu
arugil arugil vanthaan

rendu puram pattri
urugum neruppaaga
mangai urugi nindraal

thookkam vanthaale
manam thalaiyanai thaedaathu.
thaane vandhu kadhal
kollum ullam jadhagam
paarkaathu.

megam mazhai thanthaal
thuli maele pogaathu.
pennin mana vaanil
vizhavendum vidhithaan
maraadhu.

en perin pinne
nee seravaendum.
kadal konda gangai
niram maara vendum

enai maatri vidu
idhazh ootri kodu.

[Thanga magan indru
singa nadia potu
arugil arugil vanthaan

rendu puram pattri
urugum neruppaaga
mangai urugi nindraal] (2)

kattum aadai en kadhalan
kandathum naluviyatho
vetkathaalpaal adhu venthanai
kadathum vizhagiyatho

muththam enbathan
artham pazhagida vaa
en vazhve vaa.

Thanga magan indru
singa nadia potu
arugil arugil vanthaan

rendu puram pattri
urugum neruppaaga
mangai urugi nindraal
